data.description: Behavior of frictional surfaces under different types of loading. Mechanisms of heat generation and surface damage (wear, scuffing, pitting, fretting, etc.). Rheological effects. Effect of lubrication. Surface interaction in metal cutting. Design considerations. Knowledge of mechanics/strength of materials [such asE M A 303orM E 306] strongly encouraged.
data.title: FRICTION, LUBRICATION AND WEAR
